tool.name: RefSeq Accession Mapping Confirmation
tool.description: Queries NCBI to map genome accessions and/or gids to existing RefSeq accessions

param.name: email
param.label: Email
param.help: Email used with Admin emails to query NCBI.

param.name: acc_selector
param.label: Choose the method to submit accessions

param.name: acc_file
param.label: Accessions File upload
param.help: File consisting of accessions separated by newline (space)

tool.help:
**What it does** Implements a set of piped calls to NCBI using Entrez to confirm if a given input accession has a RefSeq record.
INPUT: Newline separated pasted accessions (genome accessions or gids) OR newline separated file
OUTPUT: Tab delimited table reporting if an input accession has a refseq record and the name of the organism (sanity check).
